title: Major Festival Premiere
flavor: Your latest work premieres at a respected festival; the room is packed and buzzing.
notes: Roll D6; on 4+ you succeed. On 1–3, festival is lukewarm and you barely cover costs.

title: Big Interview
flavor: An influential outlet wants a feature on you and your work—if you don’t freeze up.
notes: Use a simple check (e.g., inspiration vs target); success boosts visibility, failure is awkward but still some buzz.

title: Agent Meeting
flavor: A potential agent offers a meeting to talk long-term representation.
notes: Choice minigame: “play it safe” vs “ask for too much.” Success locks in support; failure spooks them.

title: Crowdfunding Campaign
flavor: You launch a crowdfunding campaign to support your next big project.
notes: Use a push-your-luck or multi-roll minigame; success brings backing, failure leaves you overexposed and stretched.

title: Award Nomination
flavor: You’re shortlisted for a major award; suddenly everyone is watching.
notes: Roll D6; on 5+ you win big, on 2–4 you “just” get prestige, on 1 it stings and shakes your confidence slightly.

title: Touring Opportunity
flavor: You’re invited to take the work on tour, but the logistics are intense.
notes: Use a small bidding/resource minigame; success yields profit and fans, failure drains resources without payoff.

title: Questionable Contract
flavor: A big entity offers a lucrative contract with some very sketchy terms.
notes: Choice: sign and gain money but lose craft/inspiration on success, or walk and gain respect but no cash; handle via structured choice.

title: Viral Moment
flavor: An unexpected clip or post with your work explodes online overnight.
notes: Use a quick random table: success is supportive fans + sales; failure is messy attention and burnout.

title: Burnout Wave
flavor: Deadlines, expectations, and constant output catch up with you all at once.
notes: Minigame around “rest vs grind”; success recovers food/mental energy, failure pushes you deeper into exhaustion.

title: High-Profile Collaboration
flavor: A well-known artist proposes a high-visibility collaboration.
notes: Co-op or paired-roll minigame; success upgrades both of you, failure costs time and reputation with little to show.
